title: Evidence
description: A single piece of evidence in the VOLaM-RAG knowledge base

id.description: Unique identifier for this evidence piece

content.description: The actual textual content of the evidence

score.description: Final computed score for this evidence piece

cosineScore.description: Cosine similarity score between evidence and query

nullness.description: Nullness score representing uncertainty about this evidence

empathyFit.description: Empathy fit score based on stakeholder alignment

source.description: Source document or location where this evidence originated

metadata.description: Additional metadata for tracking and debugging
